description:
Tired of never finishing a movie or paying for unused subscriptions? 

Watch ReelShort — Every Second is Drama

Say hello to ReelShort, a next-gen HD streaming short movie platform offering exclusive vertical TV mini series. Recognized by Times100 for our movie reels innovation in the entertainment industry, we're changing the way you watch movies with our one-minute short movie episodes that you can enjoy anytime, anywhere, all from the convenience of your phone with the ReelShort App.

Choose from our TV mini series library packed with endless addictive movie shorts added daily, from romantic encounters with billionaires and heart-wrenching tragedies to epic comeback stories and more—you won't ever be short on short movie entertainment!

Featured Shows:
[Don't Miss Me When I'm Gone] After losing my parents, I move in with my godmother, Aunt Sandra. I live under her roof with her two sons-the Miller brothers-surrounded by love and care. I think I’ll end up with one of them. But everything changes when the maid’s daughter, Lola, moves in. The Miller brother I love most breaks my heart into pieces. After I leave, they lose their minds trying to find me.

[Move Aside! I'm the Final Boss] Kingsley is the secret King of King's Corps and the richest man on Earth, but when he returns from the battlefield, his childhood sweetheart brutally dumps him, thinking he's a clown. How will the King of all men make her regret it?

Here's why you'll love ReelShort:

Bite-sized original movie shorts designed for on-the-go viewing
•Exclusive short movies with juicy vertical content that will keep you hooked
•New TV mini series added daily, with hundreds of new episodes each month
•Hollywood-quality entertainment, crafted for the big screen delivered to your small screen
•The first ever interactive live action short movies, where you decide what happens next
Experience the future of short movie entertainment, one minute at a time — download ReelShort now!

"Crazy Maple Studio is quietly changing the streaming game with its ReelShort app." - Time100 

"The biggest player in this new genre is ReelShort." - New York Times

"Every minute has a hook that keeps you watching." - Wall Street Journal

"ReelShort, which has dozens of shows — similarly light on character development and packed with curveballs — made for binge-watching in minutes." - Washington Post

Follow Us on Social Media

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/reelshortapp
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/reelshortapp
YouTube: https://youtube.com/@reelshortapp
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@reelshortapp
ReelShort's  Website: https://www.reelshort.com 

Notice:
If you subscribe through Apple, the payment will be deducted from your App Store account upon purchase confirmation.
Subscription privileges: While your subscription is active, you can watch all tv mini series for free.
Your subscription will take effect within 24 hours after purchase, depending on the status of your order in the Apple Store. The subscription is valid for 7 days.
Auto-Renewal: Your subscription will automatically renew. You will be charged within 24 hours before the start of each subscription period until you cancel your subscription.
Cancellation: On iOS devices, you can cancel your subscription at least 24 hours before the next renewal date by going to Settings > iTunes & App Store > Apple ID > View Apple ID > Subscriptions > ReelShort.
The subscription is billed weekly. The actual price may vary by region.

Terms of Service: https://crazymaplestudios.com/v/user-agreement
Privacy Policy: https://crazymaplestudios.com/v/privacy-agreement

Looking for the most talked about TV programmes and films from the around the world? They’re all on Netflix.

We’ve got award-winning series, films, documentaries and stand-up specials. And with the mobile app, you get Netflix while you travel, commute or just take a break.

What you’ll love about Netflix:
• We add TV programmes and films all the time. Browse new titles or search for your favourites, and stream videos straight to your device.
• The more you watch, the better Netflix gets at recommending TV programmes and films you’ll love.
• Enjoy a safe watching experience just for children with family-friendly entertainment.
• Preview quick videos of our series and films and get notifications for new episodes and releases.

Netflix membership is a month-to-month subscription that begins at sign-up. You can easily cancel at any time, online, 24 hours a day. There are no long-term contracts or cancellation fees. We just want you to love what you watch.

Please note that the App Privacy information applies to information collected through the Netflix iOS, iPadOS and tvOS apps. See the Netflix Privacy Statement (link below) to learn more about information we collect in other contexts, including account registration.

Privacy policy: www.netflix.com/privacy
Terms of use: www.netflix.com/terms

Phone number: +18667160414
Email: iosappstore@netflix.com

Watch movies, TV shows, live programming, and sports including Amazon MGM Studios-produced series and movies Road House, The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power, Fallout, Reacher, The Boys, and The Idea of You, and much more. Browse titles, search for your favorites, or enjoy movies and shows recommended just for you.

App features:
• Download videos to watch anywhere.
• Rent or buy new-release movies and popular TV shows (availability varies by marketplace).
• Cast from your phone or tablet to the big screen with Chromecast.
• Create multiple profiles so each person gets a personalized entertainment experience.
• Go behind the scenes of movies and TV shows with exclusive X-Ray access, powered by IMDb (availability varies by marketplace).

Enjoy Prime Video updates on your Apple TV or Mac by downloading the latest app from the App Store on your device. This requires an Apple TV 3rd generation or later, and for Mac, macOS Big Sur 11.4 or later.

If you subscribe to Prime Video via iTunes (where available), payment is charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase and your membership automatically renews monthly unless auto-renewal is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the then current plan period. Your account is charged for renewal within 24 hours before the end of each plan period at the rate of your selected plan. Manage your subscription and turn off auto-renewal anytime by going to My Account or through iTunes.

For customers located within the European Union, United Kingdom or Brazil: By using this app, you agree to the Amazon Conditions of Use and the Prime Video Terms of Use at primevideo.com/ww-av-legal-home. See our Privacy Notice, Cookies Notice and Interest-Based Ads Notice at primevideo.com/ww-av-legal-home.

For all other customers: By using this app, you agree to the Amazon Conditions of Use, Privacy Notice, and and the Prime Video Terms of Use at primevideo.com/ww-av-legal-home.

Discover videos from around the world and create your own with easy-to-use tools to capture your life. 

From your morning coffee to your evening commute, TikTok has the videos to make your day. Whether you’re a sports fanatic, a travel lover or simply looking for a laugh, there’s something for everyone on TikTok. Enjoy an endless stream of short videos on things you love most. Watch what you like, skip what you don’t. 
 
WATCH
A personalised video feed based on what you watch, like, and share. TikTok offers you real, interesting, and fun videos that will make your day.  You'll find a variety of videos from Food and Fashion to Sports and DIY - and everything in between.

 
CREATE
Pause and resume your video with just a tap. As many times as you need.
Millions of creators on TikTok showcase their incredible skills and every day life. Let yourself be inspired.
 
ENTERTAIN
Be entertained and inspired by a global community of creators.

Take video creation to the next level with special effects, filters, music, and more. Unlock filters, effects, and AR objects to take your videos to the next level.
 
CUSTOMISE
Our integrated editing tools allow you to easily edit your videos.
Trim, cut, merge and duplicate video clips without leaving the app.
 
ADD MUSIC
Add your favorite sound to your videos with millions of music clips and sounds. 
We curate music and sound playlists for you with the hottest tracks in every genre, including Hip Hop, EM, Pop, Rock, Rap, and Country, and the most viral original sounds.

Obtain access to LIVE benefits to better interact with hosts!
Choose between a one-month subscription or auto-renewal subscription to enjoy special LIVE benefits (currently only available in limited regions)

Note: 
If you subscribe via Apple, payment will be charged to App Store Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period at the rate of the selected plan. Subscriptions and auto-renewal may be managed by going to Account Settings after purchase.

Terms of Service —
https://www.tiktok.com/legal/terms-of-service

Privacy Policy —
https://www.tiktok.com/legal/privacy-policy

The most talked about shows and movies featuring the worlds of HBO, the DC Universe, Discovery, and beyond.  
 
With HBO Max you'll get: 
• Access to thousands of TV shows and movies.  
• Exclusive, award-winning series that everyone's talking about — like the HBO Originals The Last of Us, Succession, The White Lotus, and House of the Dragon. 
• Stream select live sports from some of your favorite events, leagues and teams. Availability varies by country or region, plan, and by subscription provider. 
• The latest hits from HBO, Max Originals, Discovery, Cartoon Network, ID, DC, Adult Swim, and more. 
• Iconic favorite TV shows like Friends, Rick and Morty, 90 Day Fiancé, Looney Tunes, and more. 
• Family-friendly entertainment for the whole household.  
• Fascinating documentaries and unscripted series.  
 
Features: 
• Enjoy your favorite shows and movies at home or on the go. HBO Max is available on select TV, web browser, mobile, tablet, and gaming console devices. (Device availability may vary by country or region and by plan.) 
• Browse or search with ease across HBO, movies, series, genres, and brands.  
• Download shows and movies you love to watch offline with select plans. (Download limits vary by plan.)  
• Create personalized profiles for the entire household complete with customizable ratings, and profile PIN protection options.  
• Pick up episodes and movies where you left off on any of your favorite devices.  
• Find everything you love, all in one place, with My Stuff.  
• Watch on multiple devices at the same time. (Limits vary by plan.)  
• Stream high-quality video up to 4K resolution and surround sound including Dolby Atmos (where available) on select plans.
 
Content, sports and feature availability on HBO Max may vary by country or region. Sports, where available, may in some countries require a separate add-on which must be added to a base plan. Some titles and features shown above may not be available in your country or region. Language availability varies by country and region.  
 
You will be charged for your subscription on a recurring basis unless you cancel at least 24 hours before your next billing date. Your App Store account will automatically be charged within 24 hours prior to the end of the current billing period. When you cancel, you will have access until the end of your current billing period. You can manage or cancel your subscription by visiting the App Store app or Subscriptions under Settings on your Apple device after purchase. 

Purposes disclosed in the App Privacy label may vary based on features or services that may not be available in all countries or regions. HBO Max is only available in certain countries or regions.  
 
Terms of Use: https://hbomax.com/terms-of-use/

Hey, we’re Hannes & Jeremy.

We’ve been there: Every game night starts with googling rules, grabbing pens and paper, or trying random apps. But there’s just no really good party app. So we decided to build one.

Our goal? Bring the best and most viral party games together in one place. For example: Who’s the Impostor? - you’ve probably seen it on TikTok or Insta.

Easy to learn. Quick to play. Perfect for 3 to 12 people.

Great for house parties, birthdays, or your next night with friends. Gather your crew - and have fun.

The app is free to enjoy with your friends! For some extra features, Splash Plus gives you full access with a weekly subscription. You can check out our Terms, EULA, and Privacy Policy here: https://cranberry.app/terms. 

Please note: This app is not intended for use as a drinking game and contains no alcohol-related content. It is suitable for all audiences seeking fun, social gameplay.

Cheers and enjoy the app!

Pobierz oficjalną aplikację CDA.pl i zyskaj wygodny dostęp do serwisu z Twojego telefonu lub tabletu. Przesyłaj filmy bezpośrednio na ekran telewizora dzięki wsparciu Chromecast. W aplikacji możesz przeglądać najpopularniejsze filmy dodane przez społeczność oraz uzyskać dostęp do filmów i seriali premium.
CDA Premium to ponad 12000 filmów i seriali dostarczonych przez oficjalnych i zweryfikowanych dystrybutorów filmowych. Oglądasz legalnie i w najlepszej jakości prosto ze swojego smartfona. Filmy dostępne są z polskim lektorem lub napisami, a bajki z dubbingiem. Korzystając z CDA Premium wspierasz legalnych dystrybutorów i producentów. Materiały dostarcza m.in. Horizontal Line, Kino Świat, BestFilm, Independent Digital, Vision Film, Media4Fun, Vitra Film czy Studio Miniatur Filmowych.
Wyjeżdżasz na wakacje? Pobierz swoje ulubione filmy, seriale lub bajki z CDA Premium i oglądaj offline - bez Internetu.
W każdym momencie możesz zrezygnować z subskrypcji.
Subskrypcja automatycznie się odnawia co miesiąc.
Subskrypcja będzie kontynuowana, chyba że zostanie anulowana w ustawieniach telefonu co najmniej jeden dzień przed końcem okresu subskrypcji.
Opłata za kolejny okres subskrypcji zostanie pobrana w ciągu 24 godzin przed upływem aktualnej subskrypcji.
Regulamin Premium:
https://www.cda.pl/regulamin/premium
Pobierając aplikację potwierdzasz, że przeczytałeś i akceptujesz Regulamin świadczenia usług oraz Politykę prywatności. Ich treść znajdziesz tutaj:
https://www.cda.pl/regulamin
https://www.cda.pl/prywatnosc

Bring home a world of endless entertainment with Disney+, bringing you the latest releases from Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars, National Geographic and more.
 
Stream must-see Originals like The Mandalorian, Loki and The Bear, blockbusters like Encanto, Avatar and Guardians of the Galaxy as well as binge-worthy series like The Simpsons, Criminal Minds and Modern Family.
 
With Disney+, you'll enjoy:
• Brand new Originals, blockbusters and epic series added frequently
• Personalised recommendations based on your viewing preferences
• Robust parental controls for family-friendly viewing
• No hidden costs and the ability to cancel at any time*
 
For help with Disney+, please visit: http://help.disneyplus.com. 
For our Subscriber Agreement and other policies, please visit: https://disneyplus.com/legal/subscriber-agreement

Some titles shown above may not be available in your country.

With the CANAL+ app, follow the big moments live, find your shows on replay even offline and discover our personalised recommendations on all your screens. 
Cinema, TV series, sports, entertainment, documentaries, kids' programmes and much more to discover in the CANAL+ app.
​
If you are already subscribed to a CANAL+ offer, the CANAL+ app is included in your subscription!
Not subscribed yet? The CANAL+ app can be accessed by subscribing to CANAL+ offers.

With the CANAL+ app, you can enjoy all the channels of your subscription and services from:
- Live: more than 200 live channels available depending on your subscription*
- Replay: thousands of programmes available at any time*
- Download: to watch even offline**
- Profiles: everyone has their own personalised account, including a secure kids' profile with ultra-simple access and an age filter to find thousands of contents, for little ones to teenagers. 
- Personalised recommendations: a selection of programmes adapted to your tastes
- Resume playback on all screens
- Expert Mode: an immersive sports experience powered by real-time data. In the Timeline tab, find stats on the live event, surveys, questions and quizzes, edited by the Sports editorial (only in certain regions)
- Multi-live: 2 to 4 live channels on a single screen
- TV Guide
- Tools to limit your data consumption
- … And many other features that we will let you discover!
Experience the complete CANAL+ experience by subscribing to CANAL+.

​
NOTE: Enjoy CHANNEL+ on all your screens: iPhone®, iPad®, PC/Mac®, Apple TV®

*Live and replay channels are specific to each region.
**At the request of distributors, some programmes cannot be broadcast or downloaded in the CANAL+ app. Channels and services subject to change, subject to Wi-Fi availability. Downloads are subject to programme availability and depend on screens.
​
Terms of Use: https://www.canalplus.com/c-g-u

SkyShowtime. Big Entertainment, Brilliant Value.
Stream blockbuster movies, exclusive series, local originals, and family favourites - all in one place. From the world’s biggest studios including Paramount, NBCUniversal, DreamWorks, and Nickelodeon.

Whether you're after a brand-new release, a timeless classic, or something for movie night with the family, there’s always something great to watch.

Why you'll love SkyShowtime:
Watch a huge selection of hollywood hits and must-see series from iconic studios.
Stream new, exclusive premieres you won't find anywhere else.
Local originals .
Kids-friendly profiles to keep the little ones entertained.
Stream anytime, anywhere, on your favourite devices.
With the freedom to cancel anytime.

Choose the plan that suits you best
Our flexible options are designed around your preferences and no matter which one you choose, you'll get full access to the same movies, series and originals.

Standard with Ads: Get the best value with our most affordable plan. In HD with ads.

Standard: Enjoy initerrupted ad-free* streaming om two devices at once. Plus, get 30 downloads for on-the-go-viewing

Premium: Stream in stunning 4K UHD definition on up to five screens at once, and enjoy 100 downloads** to watch your favourites  anytime, anywhere. All without ads* for an uninteruppted viewing experience

*May include SkyShowtime promotional trailers for movies and shows.
** Up to 30 download titles can be films.

Connect. Discover. Control.

Stay connected to your gaming friends and the games you love to play, wherever you go with PlayStation App. See who's online, voice chat and send messages, and discover deals on PS Store.

Connect with friends
• See who's online and which games they're playing.
• Voice chat and send messages to your PSN friends, hang out online and plan your next multiplayer session.
• View other players' profiles and trophy collections.

Discover new games and the latest news
• Shop for new releases, pre-order games and check out the latest deals and discounts on PlayStation Store.
• Get your daily fix of gaming news from the world of PlayStation.
• Stay up to date with notifications and invitations on your phone lock screen.

Control your console wherever you are
• Download games and add-ons to your console so they're ready when you are.
• Manage your PS5 console storage if you run out of space while downloading.
• Get ready to play with quick sign-in and remote game launch on your PS5 console.

Account for PlayStation Network required to use this app.

PlayStation terms of service are viewable at https://www.playstation.com/legal/psn-terms-of-service/.

Some features require PS5 or PS4 console.

Content available on PS App may vary by country/region. Some titles shown above may not be available in your country/region.

“PlayStation”, “PlayStation Family Mark”, “PS5” and “PS4” are registered trademarks or trademarks of Sony Interactive Entertainment Inc.

With the free Steam Mobile App, you can take Steam with you anywhere. Buy PC games and get the latest game and community news - while protecting your Steam account.

Shop Steam
Browse the Steam catalog of PC games from your phone. Never miss a sale again.

Steam Guard
Protect your Steam account and make sign in faster with two-factor authentication.
• Two-factor authentication to ensure you’re the only one with access to your account
• QR code sign in - Scan a QR code to sign into Steam instead of entering a password or…
• Sign in confirmation - Confirm your regular Steam sign ins with simple “approve” or “deny”

Library & Remote downloads
The new Library view makes it easy to view game content, discussions, guides, support, and more. Plus you can manage game downloads and updates to your PC from your phone.

Trade and Market Confirmations
Speed up item trades and sales by using your phone to confirm them.

Plus
• A personalized News feed based on your Library with the latest news, events, and content updates direct from publishers and game developers.
• Customizable Steam notifications: wishlist, sales, comments, trades, discussions, friend requests, and more.
• Access to the entire Steam Community - discussions, groups, guides, Market, Workshop, broadcasts, and more.
• Access to your friends, friend activity, groups, screenshots, inventory, wallet, and more.
• Authorized Devices - Manage access to the devices your account has signed in
• An improved Store browsing experience for mobile screens
• Support for using multiple Steam accounts in the app
• Support for customizing your app's main tabs

Najbardziej uniwersalny lokalny serwis VOD w Polsce. Tutaj znajdziesz zarówno filmy, seriale, programy rozrywkowe, informacje, sport, dokumenty. Player to także bogata biblioteka produkcji pod marką Player Original oraz discovery+ Originals, których nie obejrzysz nigdzie indziej! Korzystaj z pakietu z bliskimi i przyjaciółmi. W ramach jednego abonamentu możesz założyć aż do pięciu profili. Ulubione programy możesz oglądać na dwóch urządzeniach jednocześnie – Ty serial lub mecz, a druga osoba film! 

Dlaczego warto wybrać Playera? 

To najbardziej holistyczny serwis VOD w Polsce z najbardziej zróżnicowaną ofertą programową.

•	Ekskluzywna biblioteka seriali Player Original to ponad 20 tytułów, które już podbiły serca widzów, m.in. „Chyłka”, „Szadź”, “Skazana”, „Behawiorysta”, „Nieobecni”, „Kontrola”, „Pajęczyna”, „Tajemnica zawodowa” czy “Żywioły Saszy Ogień”.
•	Najnowsze badania agencji Kantar potwierdzają – Player to serwis posiadający najlepsze polskie seriale oraz najwięcej polskich seriali.
•	Produkcje tworzone pod marką Player Original stały się już synonimem najwyższej jakości. Grają w nich najlepszy aktorzy, reżyserują je najbardziej utytułowani reżyserzy.
•	Do końca 2023 r. na fanów Playera czeka przynajmniej 10 premier pod marką Player Original. Już możemy zdradzić, że pracujemy nad serialem inspirowanym prozą Katarzyny Puzyńskiej oraz spin-offem „Skazanej”.
•	Hity prosto z kina - ponad 300 najlepszych filmów z różnych gatunków w Twoim pakiecie. Każdy znajdzie coś dla siebie na filmowy wieczór w domowym kinie. Cały czas równolegle rozbudowujemy również bibliotekę filmów na życzenie, wśród których znajdują się tytuły pochodzące od najlepszych światowych dystrybutorów i lokalnych partnerów.
•	Prapremiery wybranych popularnych programów, czyli możesz to zobaczyć w Playerze wcześniej niż w TV, wygodnie, kiedy i jak chcesz! 
•	Całe sezony i najnowsze odcinki ulubionych programów i seriali, m.in. „Top Model”, „Kuchenne rewolucje”, „Kuba Wojewódzki, „Mam talent”, „Hotel Paradise”,  „Ślub od pierwszego wejrzenia, „Na Wspólnej” czy „Papiery na szczęście”.
•	Ekskluzywna kolekcja discovery+, składająca się z dokumentów i najlepszych treści non-fiction oraz produkcji własnych discovery+ Originals 
•	Ponad 20 kanałów TV na żywo z możliwością przewijania i oglądania już rozpoczętych programów 
•	Player to także bardzo atrakcyjna oferta sportowa i informacyjna.  W Playerze w pakiecie Eurosport Extra zobaczysz pełne relacje ze Speedway Grand Prix, najważniejszych wyścigów kolarskich świata, w tym Tour de France i Vuelty, wybranych turniejów tenisowych Wielkiego Szlema, Pucharu Świata we wspinaczce sportowej i sportów zimowych na czele z Pucharem Świata w skokach narciarskich oraz z letnich Igrzysk Olimpijskich. W kategorii NEWS znajdziecie aktualne informacje i uznane programy publicystyczne.
•	Kolekcja programów motoryzacyjnych od MotorTrend, TVN Turbo i innych liderów rynku
•	Wybrane materiały możesz oglądać w najwyższej jakości 4K i pobierać odcinki wybranych tytułów na urządzenia mobilne, żeby obejrzeć je, kiedy nie masz dostępu do internetu.
•	Codziennie nowe tytuły i premiery! 

Wchodzisz w to? Baw się dobrze! Dodaj, to co lubisz do Ulubionych, a dzięki temu otrzymasz powiadomienie o nowych odcinkach ulubionych seriali i programów.

Jeśli podoba Ci się aplikacja, wystaw nam pozytywny komentarz. Masz do nas pytania? Napisz na: hello@player.pl

With the Playlive application you will gain access to your favourite pay per view broadcasts wherever you are. The largest music, sports, comedy and many other events available on the virtual stage with the purchase of tickets in the PPV system and the VOD library. 

All this is available at your fingertips by the Playlive app. Playlive is a pay per view streaming platform. The transparent payment system allows for quick license purchase and instant access to the product. Feel the greatest emotions guaranteed by extra functionalities such as camera switch - watch the event from different perspectives and enjoy attending an online event in real time. PlayLive is also a VOD player, which allows viewers to watch archival video materials. Thanks to our application, you will make it to every show!

What will you receive with the Playlive app?

- Access to many events broadcasted live in the PPV system such as concerts, martial arts, theatre and comedy performances and more in real time
- Access to the VOD library with recorded and archived broadcasts, to which you can return multiple times for a specified period of time
- A constantly growing library of events
- Attractive features such as multi-camera transmission
- The ability to transfer the broadcast to the big screen thanks to the compatibility of the application with Google Chromecast

Sign up for free, get the best experience and enjoy participating in your favourite live events from every place in the world!

Cinema City App – Movies, Tickets & Showtimes!

Discover and enjoy your favorite movies at Cinema City – anytime, anywhere! The app makes it fast and easy to:
•	Browse Movie Listings & Showtimes: Explore current and upcoming films at all Cinema City cinemas.
•	Book Tickets Instantly: Purchase tickets in just a few taps and keep them in the app – ready to scan.
•	Watch Trailers & Film Details: Check trailers, descriptions, cast before your visit.
•	Skip the Queue with e-Tickets: Save time with digital tickets for quick entry.
•	Save Your Favorite Cinemas: Quickly access preferred locations and showtimes.
•	Set Preferences & Get Personalized Offers: Tailored promotions based on your interests.
•	Add Tickets to Mobile Wallet: All tickets stored digitally for convenience.
•	Unlimited e-Card: Your digital card always with you for easy cinema access.
•	Filter by Cinema Experience: IMAX, 4DX, VIP or 3D – see exactly what you want.

Why Use Cinema City App:
‣	Stay updated with the latest releases, movie news, and exclusive offers.
‣	Manage all bookings in one place.
‣	Enjoy a seamless and fast cinema experience.

Download the Cinema City app now to buy movie tickets, watch trailers, and never miss your favorite films!

Looking for something to watch during your daily commute, lunch break, or just to unwind after a long day? Look no further than our Dramabox!
With our app, you can access a huge selection of high-quality content from some of the best creators out there. From indie films to award-winning TV series, we've got something for everyone. And with new content added regularly, you'll always have something fresh to watch.

Here are just a few of the features you'll love about our app:

- Stream your favorite shows and movies in HD quality, no matter where you are.
- Discover new content based on your viewing preferences and what's trending in the app.
- Get personalized recommendations based on your viewing history and ratings.
- Enjoy ad-free streaming and uninterrupted viewing.
- Create playlists and save your favorite titles for later.

So what are you waiting for? Download our app now and start watching the best short movies, TV series, and drama today!

Aplikacja LOTTO. Graj gdzie chcesz i kiedy chcesz! Sprawdzaj wyniki losowań. 
Pobierz darmową aplikację LOTTO i przenieś się do świata gier online!

-Świat gier LOTTO
W naszej aplikacji grasz gdzie chcesz i kiedy chcesz. Tak jak w kolekturze. Nasze gry online to: 
‣ Lotto 
‣ Mini Lotto

Dzięki aplikacji możesz także subskrybować swoje kupony oraz sprawdzać aktualne kumulacje. Dostępne są także dokładne opisy poszczególnych gier, ich zasady, a także ceny zakładów. 


- Gierki
To najbardziej interaktywna, animowana forma zabawy w wirtualnym świecie gier LOTTO. Pozwolą Ci rozerwać się, kiedy chcesz, przez tyle czasu, ile chcesz - w dowolnym miejscu i czasie, a ich wynik jest natychmiastowy! Cały czas wprowadzamy także nowe Gierki. W aplikacji LOTTO możesz zagrać m.in. w Emotki: Gwiezdna Edycja, Piłka w grze!, Lodowy Sekret, Skarby Safari -  Wejdź w świat Gierek, odkryj swoje ulubione tytuły i zgarniaj wygrane!


- Program lojalnościowy WinTo!
Jeśli jesteś Graczem LOTTO, to masz możliwość zyskać dodatkowe korzyści grając w swoje ulubione gry. Dołącz do nowego programu lojalnościowego „WinTo!” Zbieraj punkty i wymieniaj je na kupony LOTTO, doładowania gier online lub nagrody od partnerów!


- Moje Kupony 
W aplikacji LOTTO masz dostęp do swoich kuponów na najbliższe losowania oraz ich subskrypcji. 


- Wyniki gier
Kupon zakupiony? Teraz pozostaje jedynie sprawdzić, czy zgarniesz wielkie wygrane! Po każdym losowaniu możesz sprawdzić wylosowane liczby, wchodząc w wyniki ostatnich losowań. Dzięki aplikacji LOTTO masz możliwość przejrzenia wyników dla każdej gry. 


- Dopłaty do sportu i kultury 
Każda złotówka przeznaczona na gry liczbowe LOTTO to 19 groszy dla sportu i kultury. 


- Odpowiedzialna gra
Gry przeznaczone są wyłącznie dla osób pełnoletnich. Hazard związany jest z ryzykiem, a udział w nielegalnych grach hazardowych jest niezgodny z polskim prawem. Właścicielem i operatorem aplikacji jest Totalizator Sportowy Sp. z o.o., wykonujący monopol państwa w zakresie urządzania gier hazardowych przez sieć Internet. 


- Tworzysz aplikację razem z nami
Regularnie aktualizujemy aplikację. Pracujemy nad tym, aby była ona jeszcze lepsza i spełniała Wasze oczekiwania. To dzięki Waszym sugestiom i zgłoszeniom staramy się ją ulepszać. Dziękujemy za wszystkie Wasze uwagi. 
Masz pytania? Sprawdź najczęściej zadawane pytania na stronie: https://www.lotto.pl/faq lub skontaktuj się przez chatbota, z naszym Biurem Obsługi Klienta pod numerem: 459 59 59 00, dostępnym od poniedziałku do soboty w godzinach 8:00-22:00. Więcej informacji oraz formularz kontaktowy znajdziesz również bezpośrednio w aplikacji w zakładce Kontakt.

Pilot WP – Twoja telewizja online, zawsze pod ręką!
Oglądaj ulubione seriale, filmy i mecze na żywo na swoim telefonie lub tablecie – bez umowy, bez zobowiązań, po prostu online, tam, gdzie lubisz i kiedy chcesz.
 
Co zyskujesz z Pilotem WP?
• Ponad 125 kanałów telewizyjnych w różnych pakietach – od klasycznych kanałów po sportowe, filmowe, dokumentalne i muzyczne.
• Darmowe kanały telewizji naziemnej: TVP1, TVP2, Polsat, TVN, TV4, TV Puls i inne.
• Mistrzowskie emocje na żywo z kanałami sportowymi – w tym Eleven Sports 1-4 HD.
• Programy dla najmłodszych: Cartoon Network, Disney Channel, Cartoonito.
• Topowe kanały muzyczne: Kino Polska Muzyka, Stars TV, Music Box Polska.
• Kanały dokumentalne i przyrodnicze – BBC Earth, National Geographic, Discovery Channel, Crime+Investigation.
• Informacje z Polski i ze świata: TVN24, TV Republika, CNN.
• Filmy i seriale na żywo: TVN Fabuła, Stopklatka, FX, AXN, AMC.
• Możliwość oglądania telewizji online w UE, Norwegii i Islandii.
Prosto, bez umowy, bez zbędnych formalności!
 
• Za darmo: Dostęp do 30 kanałów bez zobowiązań – wystarczy e-mail, żeby zacząć.
• Pakiety płatne: Wybierz pakiet, który pasuje do Ciebie. Sport, filmy, seriale – masz to na wyciągnięcie ręki.
• Bez reklam w pakietach premium: Skorzystaj z płatnych pakietów i oglądaj bez przerwy na reklamy.
• Oglądaj na swoich zasadach: Bez umowy, bez abonamentu, bez zobowiązań.
• TV wszędzie: Oglądaj na smartfonie, tablecie, komputerze, czy Smart TV – wystarczy dostęp do internetu.
• Full HD: Ponad 70 kanałów w jakości Full HD.
 
Pilot WP – prosta, wygodna telewizja online.
Pobierz aplikację i miej telewizję zawsze pod ręką!
 
Zakładka News: jesteś na bieżąco z najnowszymi informacjami z kraju i ze świata dzięki WP.
 
Zakładka Radio: masz pod ręką radio internetowe z twoimi ulubionymi stacjami muzycznymi dzięki Open FM.

Zyskaj czas i kupuj bilety do kina w aplikacji mobilnej Helios! Z aplikacją Helios z łatwością wybierzesz najlepsze miejsca na seansie, szybko kupisz bilet, lub go zwrócisz w razie potrzeby. Przeglądaj historię swoich seansów i dodawaj filmy do ulubionych!

WYGODA I SZYBKOŚĆ
Zaloguj się, dodaj metodę płatności i kupuj bilety w kilka sekund!

BEZ KOLEJEK
Kup bilet w dowolnej chwili, nawet w drodze do kina. Omiń kolejki i od razu wejdź do sali

KOD QR ZAMIAST BILETU
Nic nie musisz drukować. Po prostu pokaż kod w aplikacji obsłudze kina

Polsat Box Go. Streaming & Telewizja.

 

Polskie i zagraniczne seriale.
Filmowe hity – od nowości po klasyki, wybrane w 4K.
Sport na żywo – m.in. Liga Europy UEFA, Liga Konferencji UEFA, LaLiga EA Sports, PlusLiga, Orlen Basket Liga, Orlen Superliga, tenisowe turnieje Wielkiego Szlema oraz ATP, gale UFC, MotoGP.
Ponad 140 kanałów TV – telewizja bez długich zobowiązań.
Newsy i publicystyka.
Reality show, programy rozrywkowe i edukacyjne.
Bajki.
To proste!

Tematyczne pakiety i filmy w dostępie na 48h.
Intuicyjny interfejs.
System rekomendacji treści, który podpowie co oglądać.
Oglądanie nawet na 3 urządzeniach jednocześnie.
5 profili użytkownika.
Funkcja Mojej listy, do której dołożysz ulubione tytuły.
Wygodne funkcje: timeshift, startover, kontynuowanie oglądania na innym urządzeniu, przesyłanie obrazu na telewizor (Chromecast i Air Play).
Regulamin i warunki korzystania na www.polsatboxgo.pl/panel/regulaminy

Zamień swój telefon w wygodny i bezpieczny portfel biletowy.
Aplikacja eBilet umożliwia Ci szybki dostęp do wszystkich biletów zakupionych na eBilet.pl. Wystarczy, że aktywujesz aplikację na swoim telefonie - bilety pobiorą się automatycznie.

Co zyskujesz?
- Wszystkie bilety w jednym miejscu – dostępne w każdej chwili
- Niezbędne informacje o wydarzeniu - szczegóły, opis, lokalizacja
- Brak konieczności drukowania – pokazujesz ekran telefonu przy wejściu
- Pełen dostęp offline – bilet działa nawet bez internetu
- Powiadomienia o ważnych zmianach – żadnych zbędnych komunikatów
- Kod QR – szybkie wejście na koncert, spektakl czy wydarzenie sportowe
- Przekazanie biletów znajomym – wystarczy, że Twoi znajomi też mają aplikację eBilet. Wpisujesz numer telefonu kolegi/koleżanki, przekazujesz bilet i możecie iść na koncert niezależnie


Aplikacja została zaprojektowana z myślą o Twojej wygodzie – byś nie musiał już szukać biletów w skrzynce e-mail ani nosić ich w portfelu. Wszystko, co najważniejsze, masz pod ręką.


Zaufanie, które budujemy wspólnie z Allegro
eBilet to część Grupy Allegro – lidera e-commerce w Polsce. Dzięki temu możesz mieć pewność, że korzystasz z bezpiecznego, sprawdzonego i oficjalnego narzędzia. Allegro to miliony użytkowników, zaawansowana technologia i niezawodność, która teraz wspiera również Twój dostęp do wydarzeń.


eBilet – Twoje bilety zawsze pod ręką. Bez stresu. Bez papieru. Bezpiecznie.

LEGO® Builder is the official LEGO® building instructions app that will guide you on an easy and collaborative building adventure. 

Step into a new building experience

- LEGO Builder allows you to build with a fun, 3D modelling experience where you can zoom and rotate LEGO construction sets. 
- Rotate individual bricks to find the colour and shape you need, for each step of the LEGO building experience. 

Build Together

- Build Together is a fun and collaborative building experience that lets you tackle your LEGO instructions as a team, by delegating each builder their own creative tasks to complete!
 - Share your PIN code and join as a host or builder. Take your turn, complete a building step with 3D modelling, then pass to the next person for collaborative building! 
- Check if your set is supported in the app. 

1000s of LEGO instructions supported

- Search and explore the full library of LEGO instructions for construction sets from 2000 to today. Start your digital collection today! 
- You can also scan the QR code on the front cover of your paper LEGO instructions manual to open it directly in the app. 

Follow a story as you build

 - Discover enriched content for some of your favourite LEGO themes for an even better building experience. 

Unlock the full experience with a LEGO account

- Build a digital collection of your LEGO construction sets and track how many bricks you’ve got in your collection! 
- Save your building progress and pick up your LEGO instructions where you left off! 

Things to keep in mind:

You will need a stable internet connection to use this app. We’re always adding new LEGO building instructions to the experience, so you can grow and customise your digital collection and discover even more fun LEGO instructions! Want to know if your set has 3D LEGO building instructions with the Build Together mode? Check in the app and enjoy collaborative building. 

We're eager to hear how we can make the LEGO® Builder app even better for you! Please leave us your thoughts and recommendations in the reviews. LEGO, the LEGO logo, the Brick and Knob configurations, and the Minifigure are trademarks of the LEGO Group. © 2025 The LEGO Group.

The Ticketmaster app makes it easier to buy, sell, and get into the very best of live entertainment – so you can get on with making memories that last.

We give you unparalleled access to thousands of venues, artists, theatre and sports events.

DISCOVER
- Explore millions of events from concerts, festivals and theatre to sport and comedy shows
- Get real-time updates about your favourite artists, events, and venues
- Take control of your experience by browsing available seats and selecting those that best match your preferences

BUY
- Buy your tickets simply and safely
- Credit Card, Gift Cards, instalments and more – Choose the payment option that works best for you

SELL
- Safely and securely resell your tickets to fellow fans if you can’t go
- Set your price for your tickets, and if they sell, you'll be paid through your selected payment method

GET INTO THE SHOW
- No need to worry about printing tickets! Access your tickets and all event details directly from your app
-E asily transfer your tickets to family and friends before the show giving everyone the freedom to enter when they want

Download the Ticketmaster app and go live.

app_name: EVENTIM PL: We have your tix!
description:
Discover a world of endless possibilities with EVENTIM PL! Thousands of events await you. Buy tickets, discover new artists, and enjoy benefits related to your favorite events.

Key features of EVENTIM PL:

• Seat Reservation: Choose exactly the seat you want and decide how many tickets you need.

• Event List: Check dates and locations of events, add them to your calendar with one click.

• Favorite Artists: Follow your favorite performers and never miss an event.

• Favorite Venues: Mark your favorite venues and receive information about upcoming events, as well as directions and parking tips.

• PUSH Notifications: Activate notifications to stay up to date with pre-sales and newly announced concerts.

• Event Inspirations: Discover amazing events through our thematic suggestions and fan reviews. You can also add your own opinions.

• Secure Account Management: Access your mobile tickets, orders, and ticket alerts with the highest level of security.

Why choose EVENTIM PL?

Fast and easy ticket purchase for your favorite events.
Personalized recommendations based on your favorite artists and venues.
Up-to-date information on pre-sales, new tour dates, and additional concerts.
Don't miss any events in cities like Warsaw, Krakow, Wroclaw, Poznan, Gdansk, and many others!

Whether you're a fan of rock, pop, techno, classical music, or rap, EVENTIM PL is the most convenient way to purchase tickets for festivals, concerts, exhibitions, musicals, sports events, or events for children.

Have questions or need assistance? Write to us at: info@eventim.pl

Download EVENTIM PL now and always be one step ahead!
